result.arabic_text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ
result.translation: (64) Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment,[963] at once they are crying [to Allāh] for help.
result.footnotes: [963]- In worldly life, before the punishment of the Hereafter.  Although general, the description includes specifically the punishment of the Quraysh by famine.
